# Important Notice

This project includes a PyTorch-based **3D U‑Net** implementation originally developed by **zyl200846** (GitHub username), based on the 3D U‑Net architecture proposed by **Özgün Çiçek et al.** The source code was modified by **Yu‑Yuan Yang** to simplify the directory structure, while retaining the original **MIT license**.

- **Implementation:** https://github.com/zyl200846/3D-UNet-PyTorch-Implementation/tree/master  
- **Reference:** Çiçek, Ö.; Abdulkadir, A.; Lienkamp, S. S.; Brox, T.; Ronneberger, O. *3D U-Net: Learning Dense Volumetric Segmentation from Sparse Annotation.* In *Medical Image Computing and Computer-Assisted Intervention – MICCAI 2016*; Ourselin, S., Joskowicz, L., Sabuncu, M. R., Unal, G., Wells, W., Eds.; Lecture Notes in Computer Science; Springer International Publishing: Cham, 2016; pp 424–432. https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-46723-8_49.
